snippet: Initial reports suggested that the fatal shooting occurred after a dispute broke out between coalition and Afghan soldiers in the Marja district of Helmand Province.
abstract: Man wearing Afghan Army uniform opens fire on coalition soldiers in southern Afghanistan, killing one service member; NATO is investigating the attack. (S)

byline.original: By GRAHAM BOWLEY; Taimoor Shah contributed reporting

lead_paragraph: KABUL, Afghanistan -- An attacker in an Afghan Army uniform opened fire on coalition soldiers in southern Afghanistan on Sunday, killing one service member. It was possibly the latest in a recent string of so-called green-on-blue assaults on coalition soldiers by their Afghan partners this year. The attacker was killed when coalition soldiers returned fire, NATO said. As is NATO policy, officials did not confirm the nationality of the coalition soldier, or give any other details. NATO said it was investigating the attack.

headline.main: Attacker in Garb Of Afghan Army Kills a Soldier
